Text: Sorry if the naming of the files is a bit silly, but my mp3 player doesn't like to fast forward through long files, so I chopped them up into 5 minute segments.
great! Please make 'Red Seas Under Red Skies', the second book in the series!
Please please seed this. :D This is a wonderful book and I would also like to say thank you for breaking it up into small chunks, it makes it much easier to manage!
